content: use this textured stitch to create a gorgeous striped blanket instructions for creating this blanket in any size you want are included in the pattern baby blanket yep king size bed if you dare to create the same blanket i made you ll need the following 2 skeins paintbox yarn simply aran in blush pink 2 skeins paintbox yarn in pistachio green 2 skeins paintbox yarn in paper white 1 skein of stylecraft special aran in parchment
